alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 08 at 2:08PM PST until March 09 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Mendocino Coast, Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County
